characters.name: Warrior
characters.bio: Standard tank character with high defense and attack power.

characters.name: Sorcerer
characters.bio: Trades lower attack power for greater list of spells.

characters.name: Rogue
characters.bio: Balanced character equally adept at using magic as they are at physical attacks.

game.description: You open the doorway of the castle and walk towards the open lobby. In front of you is a staircase that descends below you. To your left is a large ornate door. To your right is a large statue in the shape of a human figure.
